Eternal Being.quote: "I am the unborn, the eternal, the imperishable." (Bhagavad Gita 4:6)

Pure Existence.quote: "Existence is pure consciousness, pure bliss." (Brihadaranyaka Upanishad 3.9.28)

Ground of Being.quote: "In Him we live and move and have our being." (Acts 17:28)

Nature of Existence.quote: "All existence is one unified field of consciousness." (Vedanta Sutra 1.1.1)

Levels of Existence.quote: "From matter to mind to spirit, existence ascends." (Sri Aurobindo, The Life Divine)

Source of Existence.quote: "From fullness, fullness comes. From existence, existence manifests." (Isha Upanishad)

Existential Reality.quote: "The Real is one without a second." (Chandogya Upanishad 6.2.1)

Divine Presence.quote: "Wheresoever you turn, there is the Face of Allah." (Quran 2:115)

Cosmic Existence.quote: "The universe is pervaded by Me in My unmanifest form." (Bhagavad Gita 9:4)

Transcendent Being.quote: "Beyond being and non-being, He alone is." (Mundaka Upanishad 2.2.1)

Manifest Existence.quote: "All that exists is but a manifestation of the One." (Plotinus, Enneads)

Existential Truth.quote: "Truth is existence, existence is truth." (Zen saying)

Universal Being.quote: "The Self is all this universe." (Chandogya Upanishad 7.25.2)

Essential Nature.quote: "The nature of existence is emptiness, emptiness itself is existence." (Heart Sutra)

Divine Substance.quote: "God is the only substance that can exist or be conceived." (Spinoza, Ethics)

Existential Unity.quote: "All existence is one seamless whole." (Advaita Vedanta)

Absolute Reality.quote: "That which is, was, and ever shall be." (Egyptian Book of the Dead)

Divine Consciousness.quote: "Consciousness is the foundation of all existence." (Upanishads)

Ultimate Being.quote: "Beyond name and form is the Absolute." (Ramana Maharshi)

Divine Essence.quote: "The essence of existence is consciousness itself." (Kashmir Shaivism)

Existential Purpose.quote: "The purpose of existence is to realize the Divine." (Swami Vivekananda)

Being-Itself.quote: "God is Being-Itself, not a being." (Paul Tillich)

Divine Life.quote: "The divine life manifests in all existence." (Sri Aurobindo)

Eternal Now.quote: "There is only the eternal present." (Eckhart Tolle)

Supreme Reality.quote: "The Supreme Reality is one without a second." (Upanishads)
